fileheader.author: Tony Peden
fileheader.note:
This model was created using publicly available data, publicly available technical reports, textbooks, and guesses. It contains no proprietary or restricted data. It has been validated only to the extent that it seems to "fly right", and possibly to comply to published, publicly known, performance data (maximum speed, endurance, etc.). Thus, this model is meant for educational and entertainment purposes only.
This simulation model is not endorsed by the manufacturer. This model is not to be sold.

aerosurface_scale.name: fcs/left-aileron-control
aerosurface_scale.description: The output from this control is in radians.

actuator.name: fcs/left-aileron-actuator
actuator.description: The input to this actuator is in radians.

aerosurface_scale.name: fcs/right-aileron-control
aerosurface_scale.description: The output from this control is in radians.

actuator.name: fcs/right-aileron-actuator
actuator.description: The input to this actuator is in radians.

function.name: aero/angle/right_wing_tip_alpha
function.description: This parameter calculates the angle of attack at the right wingtip, accounting for the motion of the wing at that point away from the CG.

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-lift
function.description: Change in lift due to ground effect factor.

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-drag
function.description: Change in drag due to ground effect

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLDf
function.description: Delta lift due to flap deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/CDDf
function.description: Delta drag due to flap deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/CYp
function.description: Side force due to roll rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/CYr
function.description: Side force due to yaw rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clp
function.description: Roll moment due to roll rate (roll damping)

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clr
function.description: Roll moment due to yaw rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/CmDf
function.description: Delta pitching moment due to flap deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmq
function.description: Pitch moment due to pitch rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmadot
function.description: Pitch moment due to alpha rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmde
function.description: Pitch moment due to elevator deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnp
function.description: Yaw moment due to roll rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnr
function.description: Yaw moment due to yaw rate
